channel.title: Whonix 16.0.0.8 (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
# Testers Wanted!
Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Testers_Only_Version
----
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Release Upgrade Whonix 15 to Whonix 16](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Release_Upgrade_Whonix_15_to_Whonix_16) instructions.
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Major Changes
* ported Debian base from Debian 10 `buster` to Debian 11 `bullseye` ([discussion](https://forums.whonix.org/t/debian-bullseye-port/12056/5)) * switched back from `deb.torproject.org` `tor` package to `packages.debian.org` stable `tor` package (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Tor) * package binaries-freedom is deprecated ([reason](https://forums.whonix.org/t/policy-for-inclusion-of-compiled-software/6635/17)) (electrum installed from `packages.debian.org` stable repository) * enable [Debian fasttrack repository](https://fasttrack.debian.net/) by default * updated paths from `/usr/lib` to `/usr/libexec` where appropriate as per lintian Debian FSH * VirtualBox version: this release is using VirtualBox guest additions version `6.1.26-dfsg-3` from https://packages.debian.org/sid/virtualbox (downloaded from Debian and added to local (and Whonix) APT repository during Whonix build process). Next release will most likely use `fasttrack.debian.net`version ([details](https://forums.whonix.org/t/challenges-installing-virtualbox/9984))
----
# Known Issues
* Desktop background image currently is the same for Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation. This will most likely be fixed in the next release.
----
# Notable Changes
* [anon-apt-sources-list](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-apt-sources-list) * [enable fasttrack.debian.net by default](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-apt-sources-list/-/commit/14e7fc11fdcb036ce99e4651e348369152341d15) * [add fasttrack.debian.net](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-apt-sources-list/-/commit/beb7359ef219a99ebe2aedbfcdeff649706adbb3) * [enable backports repository by default](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-apt-sources-list/-/commit/05f19b546e5f0ff11c57e313e1baeae2c369c7ca) * [anon-gw-anonymizer-config](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config) * [actually `ControlPort 9052`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/-/commit/b35428a33f790b60fda382658eb85f2062f2622e) * [`ControlPort 9052` Required for onion-grater updates. https://gitlab.torproject.org/tpo/core/tor/-/issues/25173](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/-/commit/8648d8ad040d965f8018b542b033e3c6bcf8e498) * [anon-meta-packages](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-meta-packages) * [binaries-freedom -> electrum](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-meta-packages/-/commit/b62db95a20df69f8e75fcc4e9dece8f5c9017525) * [whonix-shared-packages-recommended-cli: add kicksecure-recommended-cli](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-meta-packages/-/commit/8096d3d57d85298c56e7f05a4d06f555e257148f) * [remove flashproxy-client and fteproxy from Whonix-Gateway since deprecated in Debian bullseye](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-meta-packages/-/commit/7488c0bdea6a1c2a415d514ba1dc4d4b60fa2709) * [remove obfsproxy (deprecated obfsproxy version 3) but keep obfs4proxy from Whonix-Gateway obfs4proxy package is deprecated in Debian bullseye](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-meta-packages/-/commit/6054e957db7b86249905e1108e30211236434b05) * [anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor) * [Provides: obfsproxy, obfs4proxy](https://gitlab.com/whonix/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor/-/commit/6ee5b5b03d09dae202f2f55ff603c96dca2bf386) * [apparmor-profile-dist](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-dist) * [security-msic `/run/faillock/** rwc,`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-dist/-/commit/41e3bb610efbff440299694bf00117240ed8b12e) * [pam security-misc bullseye](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-dist/-/commit/51c82b715fe47fecf9fb0c76317ba3558f5af455) * [/etc/security/ r,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-dist/-/commit/b6f37eccd785cc3dfdc3e6295948be0233ddd418) * [/etc/security/faillock.conf r,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-dist/-/commit/4554d97de8cbc126b11fc8504739bd138a8f1922) * [apparmor-profile-everything](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-everything) * [rm_conffile /etc/apparmor.d/sbin.networking-aae](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-everything/-/commit/51d75f497ac629d7d82f8c96623edd985b52bf85) * [usrmerge - renamed: etc/apparmor.d/sbin.networking-aae -> etc/apparmor.d/usr.sbin.networking-aae](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-everything/-/commit/895ddd1c06289dab673906cbdf19d61ea1bdf794) * [usrmerge - renamed: sbin/networking-aae -> usr/sbin/networking-aae](https://gitlab.com/whonix/apparmor-profile-everything/-/commit/6d70eefe95d3399faed96352a339810393e4833a) * [genmkfile](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile) * [genmkfile deb-install: install using `apt-get install` instead of `dpkg -i` for dependency resolution (sdwdate vs time-deamon)](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/87258fc755b5744b4ae4233484ce320f73e388f8) * [update make_dependencies_filter_helper](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/ae57c0c32ec1f7e6b57fd0ca9e766e5d7c564a2c) * [exclude `/debian` folder from upstream tarball to avoid lintian warning `no-debian-changes`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/45a3bec7a01b34c6fa6ae0db1a5bdf3bfdb04eca) * [Force the inclusion of the original source if Debian package revision number is higher than 1. LKRG package compatibility fix.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/2a0d7eb4a9e606a909258281f514aa82b99b6212) * [improve support for debian/changelog file without epoch](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/2c68f84894608617337fb2fb0c9f37cd17325514) * [add support for debian/changelog file without epoch](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/76a79fb21defa258f51933db9ab1f314852ee6c8) * [LKRG v0.9.1 compatibility](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/43bedd4677b12f62bed54c6d3aa8781fc673a6d9) * [clean up temporary file "debian/$package.dkms.debhelper"](https://gitlab.com/whonix/genmkfile/-/commit/56611936b5cdef54edd02285eeee0f9786476879) * [helper-scripts](https://gitlab.com/whonix/helper-scripts) * [etc/apparmor.d/abstractions/tor-circuit-established-check: deny /etc/ssl/openssl.cnf r, Not needed. Works without.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/helper-scripts/-/commit/4ff5276723b765ec3da4e1c465bc3d16aa5a8c20) * [implement `/usr/libexec/helper-scripts/first-boot-skel` `force` to ease Default Home Folder Configuration Files Reset https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Desktop#Default_Home_Folder_Configuration_Files_Reset](https://gitlab.com/whonix/helper-scripts/-/commit/e021874a31e4a4ed9f2c46ff1925c5dfa79691de) * [move usr/lib/helper-scripts/ to usr/libexec/helper-scripts move usr/lib/curl-scripts to usr/libexec/helper-scripts as per lintian FHS](https://gitlab.com/whonix/helper-scripts/-/commit/8a95a1cb7f1e01762ec607abbe5702c0ee766010) * [kicksecure-base-files](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-base-files) * [`/etc/kicksecure_version`: `16`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-base-files/-/commit/c002d6b6029644c3bbf9c1311ab512a70d1397a7) * [kicksecure-meta-packages](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages) * [add chromium to dummy-dependency so it can be removed](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/8f1eae9599746177b1e42458ec44ae5c6890c618) * [binaries-freedom -> electrum](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/d0151d51e90b0e59b933a25d908c1c5f5f22ac2f) * [move obfs4proxy from kicksecure-dependencies-cli to kicksecure-recommended-cli https://forums.whonix.org/t/meta-packages-development-discussion/11948](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/3bfcf3cf9c48fc370b36789b5ae5ad89a7b53ffc) * [kicksecure-cli Depends: kicksecure-recommended-cli](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/3e08328b9439ab46560c366b45da765e1ac1a409) * [introduce kicksecure-recommended-cli install fasttrack-archive-keyring by default https://forums.whonix.org/t/install-debian-fasttrack-archive-keyring-by-default/11456](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/a0d9bd549e99d7c84dcda226bffb9ffcafb4d02e) * [bullseye: libexo-1-0 -> libexo-2-0](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/1269ce8533dd521f670bded1deb33459768ce4de) * [Merge branch 'HulaHoop0-master-patch-35409' into 'master' Added obfs4proxy and firefox-esr See merge request whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages!1](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/5bad8176bb3634e4a64d51edb3e58c7d07f94e8a) * [Added obfs4proxy and firefox-esr](https://gitlab.com/whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages/-/commit/7ba985581cfd02092186bc8cbe584ac4c0f086f9) (Thanks to @HulaHoop!!) * [onion-grater](https://gitlab.com/whonix/onion-grater) * [upgrade to newer onion-grater version by Tails](https://gitlab.com/whonix/onion-grater/-/commit/5655e2f3bf4cffc5f6c2336a542d0c9ea5ca952b) * [open-link-confirmation](https://gitlab.com/whonix/open-link-confirmation) * [qubes-whonix](https://gitlab.com/whonix/qubes-whonix) * [yum -> dnf](https://gitlab.com/whonix/qubes-whonix/-/commit/ef6b132f45a00601415f2d48a94a2357eef46ae1) * [Honor skip-torified-updates-proxy-check qvm-service Reintroduce the ability (from qubes-whonix < 15.4) to skip the torified-updates-proxy-check script by enabling a qvm-service. This allows a Whonix template to be updated through a non-Whonix qubes.UpdatesProxy VM if necessary.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/qubes-whonix/-/commit/07367f83fbbea9c9a1811c88e0fd12b0d0e615d4) (Thanks to Rusty Bird!) * [rads](https://gitlab.com/whonix/rads) * [do not start display manager if it was disabled (for example using `sudo systemctl disable lightdm`)](https://gitlab.com/whonix/rads/-/commit/74fbd3b6a460de94bbdfedd1d863dba9bee3d855) * [repository-dist](https://gitlab.com/whonix/repository-dist) * [legacy](https://gitlab.com/whonix/repository-dist/-/commit/d01e9cc3724ee6e65760dddac40651ba8a5be5f3) * [required change `/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/derivative.gpg` -> `/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/derivative.asc`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/repository-dist/-/commit/4b7228db4a038d36315880cf6878dd713a0bcb37) * [use ascii armored gpg key; code simplification since APT folder `/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d` support ascii armored gpg keys since Debian `bullseye`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/repository-dist/-/commit/3a1764721f24c3d2cb681a9f49da2f11e51c9f12) * [gnupg2 (dummy transitional package) -> gnupg](https://gitlab.com/whonix/repository-dist/-/commit/08de96e54385678bc3db5b47c26721dfa14711bf) * [sdwdate](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate) * [deny /usr/sbin/ldconfig rix,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate/-/commit/23a24206567bd27134b68e459ae9b1c4b75f68de) * [Conflicts: time-daemon](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate/-/commit/046a1c00b9aa4b578f16e88e0cc355776dd15c08) * [Replaces: time-daemon](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate/-/commit/11361d7fbfdf4a5e5762d407fef25e9bd1593d07) * [Revert "bullseye" This reverts commit 67222afa9b01c8bba1f814d5c57b1c7632355d6d.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate/-/commit/9fee551dca38a7cc5cf940224f3a08cdae6c1956) * [Provides: time-daemon to avoid systemd pulling Depends: systemd-timesyncd](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate/-/commit/0c38702517df5b3344f14635f4b9700217e697f4) * [config-test](https://gitlab.com/whonix/sdwdate/-/commit/4eb6536d3e7cdd33fc00565f87c2fbe0e9947010) * [security-misc](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc) * [add hardened malloc compatibility for haveged workaround `/lib/systemd/system/haveged.service.d/30_security-misc.conf` `SystemCallFilter=getrandom` Otherwise haveged will exit with a core dump.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/7d73b3ffa0bf13ba78debfb7f099758b0d0fbef3) * [port from pam_tally2 to pam_faillock since pam_tally2 was deprecated upstream](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/582492d6d8c5f756be4d809898707cb196c5c765) * [port from pam_tally2 to pam_faillock since pam_tally2 was deprecated upstream](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/2bf0e7471cbd3b813ce385d994e43e48636f7a0b) * [enable "`apt-get --error-on=any`" by default makes apt exit non-zero for transient failures `/etc/apt/apt.conf.d/40error-on-any` https://forums.whonix.org/t/debian-bullseye-apt-get-error-on-any/12068](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/0492f28aa10dc93063ff3b46107fa705c5ee0d7e) * [replace no longer required `/usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper` with `apt-get --error-on=any`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/240ec7672a4d513e7e6cca280aca3d67c265d1cc) * [port LKRG compatibility settings automation for VirtualBox hosts from systemd to dpkg trigger](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/5a65c35479f267b026c03e195658ef9d98ee519c) * [improve LKRG VirtualBox host configuration as per https://github.com/openwall/lkrg/issues/82#issuecomment-886188999](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/7e128636b3a4ea7fe5dfa12018685ab7b5dda706) * [add LKRG compatibility settings automation for VirtualBox hosts https://github.com/openwall/lkrg/issues/82](https://gitlab.com/whonix/security-misc/-/commit/257cef24baa038b21ef511e9d95c4229a5e16f68) * [systemcheck](https://gitlab.com/whonix/systemcheck) * [apparmor bullseye](https://gitlab.com/whonix/systemcheck/-/commit/83244c59499cd9e593bc4ee1849ec887e0d781fe) * [@{PROC}/sys/kernel/osrelease r,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/systemcheck/-/commit/0acf98f71b91bff962a8c6c30ade1d52015baee5) * [replace no longer required `/usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper` with `apt-get --error-on=any`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/systemcheck/-/commit/aaaa46d9c7f7bf2ea96c0c6b7534ca1333079da0) * [tb-starter](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-starter) * [improve function tb_prefs_js_file_patches](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-starter/-/commit/f6c7fa071c96100c96ba5622f9a8d7c8ea8a495d) * [Update path to local browser homepage. Patch prefs.js in user home folder. Because it changed during Whonix 15 to Whonix 16 upgrade. from /usr/share/homepage/whonix-welcome-page/whonix.html to /usr/share/doc/homepage/whonix-welcome-page/whonix.html](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-starter/-/commit/a656c7e67d3adb80e989a089821433d38007e4d4) * [delete /usr/share/tb-profile-i2p/profile.i2p/bookmarks.html since unused](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-starter/-/commit/549d20a92b90379b18221e0ae1b96f9405e81da4) * [usr/share/homepage -> usr/share/doc/homepage](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-starter/-/commit/e9c41b7a645a526aec8764c82259d3c2234eb49f) * [tb-updater](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-updater) * [alpha tbb_hardcoded_version="11.0a4"](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-updater/-/commit/a070941c05a9879f4a6e0b009bf2237f28b10268) * [tbb_hardcoded_version="10.5.5"](https://gitlab.com/whonix/tb-updater/-/commit/fe840f6446087b2ed5b09e144e517c2875e21aa0) * [usability-misc](https://gitlab.com/whonix/usability-misc) * [replace no longer required `/usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper` with `apt-get --error-on=any`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/usability-misc/-/commit/7291238c1752bc88be73b1f1d031169034db340b) * [uwt](https://gitlab.com/whonix/uwt) * [usr/lib/uwt_settings_show -> usr/bin/uwt_settings_show](https://gitlab.com/whonix/uwt/-/commit/8fad01d11eddc1f44cd15cef50903bc96156dfe3) * [vm-config-dist](https://gitlab.com/whonix/vm-config-dist) * [VirtualBox guest additions installer: switch to `interest-await` trigger Using `interest-await` instead of previously `interest-noawait` because when `virtualbox-guest-additions-iso` was upgraded as the same time as `vm-config-dist` the trigger was not executed.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/vm-config-dist/-/commit/9a3d7b64a65a32839cf3edc0ef469c9a5e17f586) * [Removed folder existence conditional to prevent catch-22](https://gitlab.com/whonix/vm-config-dist/-/commit/2ed18a9d67b519ce6b85ab1de03fd3b91af491ca) (Thanks to @HulaHoop!!) * [whonix-base-files](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-base-files) * [`/etc/whonix_version`: `16`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-base-files/-/commit/4ebfe6691120f45aed43b9b28c88252ab0184955) * [renamed: usr/lib/whonix/whonix.sh -> usr/libexec/whonix-base-files/whonix.sh](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-base-files/-/commit/69c6312a8ec8976fbfb61b5336e6c595512d9e5d) * [whonix-developer-meta-files](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-developer-meta-files) * [renamed: migrate_to_buster_proposed_updates_repository -> migrate_to_proposed_updates_repository renamed: migrate_to_buster_repository -> migrate_to_stable_repository renamed: migrate_to_buster_testers_repository -> migrate_to_testers_repository](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-developer-meta-files/-/commit/126c8592c92fa4b78b71867b471f63508ed51325) * [modify warrant canary text as per: https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Dev/Warrant_Canary_Draft&oldid=65156 https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-warrant-canary/3208/29](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-developer-meta-files/-/commit/a6289a8b5e0b3db83b9c00f1df5818f6a2c7d2b6) * [whonix-firewall](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-firewall) * [TODO: /{,usr/}bin/qubesdb-cmd rUx,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-firewall/-/commit/69e89b344c3cffaa9553b83b77858d60f040fba8) * [owner /run/updatesproxycheck/** rw,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-firewall/-/commit/3f49f174091e5e84a801c81fc36082c7ad135e5a) * [TODO: /{,usr/}bin/qubesdb-read rUx](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-firewall/-/commit/c9356e1e34b50fbc2de0a3d73e0f0c50cd486f92) * [After=systemd-modules-load.service required for LKRG otherwise iptables modules cannot be auto load](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-firewall/-/commit/98a0b91a53d115cd042bb3c7663a4470be02aece) * [/var/log/journal/{,**} r,](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-firewall/-/commit/fa732e9634a44fa5a5952eebef953d735be64106) * [whonix-initializer](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-initializer) * [change path](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-initializer/-/commit/37cb445a84c2f3918bccb14ba3dc102723ad15fd) * [whonix-legacy](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy) * release-upgrade](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/ee1a9b03c02df748b0b3df9c30eaa5db5d88b188) * [release-upgrade: fix, respect onion sources](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/456a0e638b04cc9dab474ecb58ff77bee29c8857) * [workaround for Qubes specific `perl: warning: Setting locale failed.` issue https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4889](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/10a72921677881eb85283ff4ad46b03f5b49a8b6) * release-upgrade](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/2aef1e530169e7790e5f5447a0bcd6e501cedd45) * [improve release-upgrade](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/63f9469ad0db93bee2ecc8c72def7bfc30edb149) * [improve release-upgrade](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/c59f6b48a7a7e866b8b2a430fc46fe20da3a6bc0) * [improve release-upgrade](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/17e041cdea34f0c5421fb23b5222e34c14e636d3) * [forward port release-upgrade improvements](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/9628a8136c971370a1c1efaf2317b2d72770de4a) * [renamed: usr/libexec/release-upgrade -> usr/sbin/release-upgrade](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/eb3fc5d912798b98d240aa1788d966bc8d151433) * [release-upgrade script: replace the apt functionality test package python-qt4 with nano siince python-qt4 installs too many packages, dependencies and nano is installed by default. Much faster test.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/bbad2596cffa06c6156d2ca784c8271fe89fa4e9) * [port release upgrade script to bullseye](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-legacy/-/commit/f3add80f849c7080fceeaf86da2104aea0b2dd4c) * [whonix-welcome-page](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-welcome-page) * [usr/share/homepage -> usr/share/doc/homepage](https://gitlab.com/whonix/whonix-welcome-page/-/commit/e260ebb241936d17d5699d90e6cf568e7eeecde7) * [Whonix build script](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix) * [remove virtualbox-guest-dkms since deprecated in Debian (integrated into kernel)](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/d6f4b0beeb7da7c857a0944d5341f738a1825ca0) * [fasttrack](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/993dc55adef8fd6227dcf028a31f78df7af4af38) * [.gpg -> .asc](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/61a4fa8feb1ca8bb66f8692f98fe0ed0b0f6a347) * [Revert "build sources, Debian fasttrack: disable temporrily" This reverts commit 288323a86e2dc037b03e004c62ab3f8ce2b1f616.](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/ea0ea5ed5b66bb99c4b1851954d4c116b690a3c4) * [avoid build dependency on ftpsync (for rsync test script)](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/db2b3b0439da69198e6fe15da14cd539f89a48bb) * [VirtualBox builds: switch back to guest additions packages - `virtualbox-guest-utils` - `virtualbox-guest-dkms` - `virtualbox-guest-x11` (Previously `virtualbox-guest-additions-iso`.)](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/22c9e145a9fdb53358e56fd37fa34ebe3db5fb6c) * [VirtualBox builds: temporarily download package `virtualbox` from Debian `sid` until it becomes available from either Debian `fasttrack` or `virtualbox.org` https://forums.whonix.org/t/challenges-installing-virtualbox/9984/6](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/79f73c563c0c12afbf19b479e2c6426ac9ebc005) * [VirtualBox builds: accept both sources of VirtualBox packages - either package `virtualbox` (by Debian), or - package `virtualbox-6.1` (by virtualbox.org)](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/2e9b99f5991dd5a62083a91bde597ccd4100f108) * [build sources, Debian fasttrack: disable temporrily until https://salsa.debian.org/fasttrack-team/support/-/issues/24 is fixed](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/288323a86e2dc037b03e004c62ab3f8ce2b1f616) * [help-steps/repo_download_chroot_script: fix for Debian bullseye update order of parameters passed toAPT](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/4c4b6899446b65ff98b0c714806e22879cd22ea6) * [disable download_virtualbox_packages_virtualbox_guest_additions_iso_from_debian_sid moving to Debian fasttrack version](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/37a58d3ccef9e055fa77375f08f609c37f34a4dc) * [disable download_virtualbox_packages_virtualbox_org moving to Debian fasttrack version](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/d18114145217bd0fa97c5b90a162fa4115a44675) * [fasttrack](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/4117aa571c4c54268098949377fec890be300edf) * [fasttrack](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/1097167d5d947b2591319ba7c727380bfdbb9852) * [default whonix_build_auto_retry="0" auto retry function error handler trap lacks variables such as variable APTGETOPT. Would miss out on security related APT configuration options: apt-get --error-on=any / -o APT::Update::Error-Mode=any](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/a00bd523073aaceb1f5cd674b54e734fb93c7518) * [add backports and fasttrack to build sources by default to support downloading VirtualBox from Debian fasttrack](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/067b8c2f6dafbbcb6ea00eaf2f25c90b88508764) * [build dependencies for maintainers](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/6a0f72a701799879b23de92a2855aba7f756bb22) * [remove python from cowbuilder image since no longer required since apt-get-update wrapper is no longer required](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/21451c66870549e441e50f2bdd8008ba33f8d4a5) * [back to Tor version from packages.debian.org (instead of earlier deb.torproject.org) https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Tor https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-integration-in-whonix/10593](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/e6b372d18f582b35900899d2aa076e4d1b5073a2) * [remove mmdebstrap copy from this source code no longer required version from Debian bullseye package is recent enough](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/37d3c0062d8fbb4413d3113cc67f2ea4020e9cba) * [remove python from cowbuilder image since no longer required since apt-get-update wrapper is no longer required](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/ff75fd30f698c61a3276a811c8fcd5a5be7a1298) * [`python3.9` no longer required in `grml_packages` since apt --error-on=any obsoleted any need for a python based apt-get wrapper](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/a8aaeddad3feb15ba894c4c0c75288b20642a3e1) * [replace no longer required `/usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper` with `apt-get --error-on=any`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/2ba4bcec1cd56c58cec7cb18b82d801abc58a0ae) * [replace no longer required `/usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper` with `apt-get --error-on=any`](https://gitlab.com/whonix/Whonix/-/commit/9cdc94271739b373ff19eeb7506193c6a9b47250)
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.1.9.3-developers-only...16.0.0.8-developers-only
----
(This testers wanted announcement might in future be [transformed](https://forums.whonix.org/t/transform-whonix-testers-wanted-forum-news-post-into-whonix-release-forum-news-post-ok/11405) into a stable release announcement if no major issues are found during the testing period.)

item.title: Whonix 16.0.0.8 (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Tested the installation, working good. Great Job!

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix 16.0.0.8 (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Whonix 16.0.0.8 (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Testers Wanted!

Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 28 Apr 21

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Testers Only Version

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Testers Only Version

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Release Upgrade Whonix 15 to Whonix 16 instructions.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 9 Dec 20

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin, Monero, Bank Wire

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 31 May 21

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Major Changes

  • ported Debian base from Debian 10 buster to Debian 11 bullseye (discussion)
  • switched back from deb.torproject.org tor package to packages.debian.org stable tor package (Tor integration in Whonix ™ Development Notes)
  • package binaries-freedom is deprecated (reason) (electrum installed from packages.debian.org stable repository)
  • enable Debian fasttrack repository by default
  • updated paths from /usr/lib to /usr/libexec where appropriate as per lintian Debian FSH
  • VirtualBox version: this release is using VirtualBox guest additions version 6.1.26-dfsg-3 from Debian -- Details of package virtualbox in sid (downloaded from Debian and added to local (and Whonix) APT repository during Whonix build process). Next release will most likely use fasttrack.debian.netversion (details)

Known Issues

  • Desktop background image currently is the same for Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation. This will most likely be fixed in the next release.

Notable Changes

  • anon-apt-sources-list
    • enable fasttrack.debian.net by default
    • add fasttrack.debian.net
    • enable backports repository by default
  • anon-gw-anonymizer-config
    • actually ControlPort 9052
    • ControlPort 9052 Required for onion-grater updates. https://gitlab.torproject.org/tpo/core/tor/-/issues/25173
  • anon-meta-packages
    • binaries-freedom → electrum
    • whonix-shared-packages-recommended-cli: add kicksecure-recommended-cli
    • remove flashproxy-client and fteproxy from Whonix-Gateway since deprecated in Debian bullseye
    • remove obfsproxy (deprecated obfsproxy version 3) but keep obfs4proxy from Whonix-Gateway obfs4proxy package is deprecated in Debian bullseye
  • anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor
    • Provides: obfsproxy, obfs4proxy
  • apparmor-profile-dist
    • security-msic /run/faillock/** rwc,
    • pam security-misc bullseye
    • /etc/security/ r,
    • /etc/security/faillock.conf r,
  • apparmor-profile-everything
    • rm_conffile /etc/apparmor.d/sbin.networking-aae
    • usrmerge - renamed: etc/apparmor.d/sbin.networking-aae → etc/apparmor.d/usr.sbin.networking-aae
    • usrmerge - renamed: sbin/networking-aae → usr/sbin/networking-aae
  • genmkfile
    • genmkfile deb-install: install using apt-get install instead of dpkg -i for dependency resolution (sdwdate vs time-deamon)
    • update make_dependencies_filter_helper
    • exclude /debian folder from upstream tarball to avoid lintian warning no-debian-changes
    • Force the inclusion of the original source if Debian package revision number is higher than 1. LKRG package compatibility fix.
    • improve support for debian/changelog file without epoch
    • add support for debian/changelog file without epoch
    • LKRG v0.9.1 compatibility
    • clean up temporary file “debian/$package.dkms.debhelper”
  • helper-scripts
    • etc/apparmor.d/abstractions/tor-circuit-established-check: deny /etc/ssl/openssl.cnf r, Not needed. Works without.
    • implement /usr/libexec/helper-scripts/first-boot-skel force to ease Default Home Folder Configuration Files Reset https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Desktop#Default_Home_Folder_Configuration_Files_Reset
    • move usr/lib/helper-scripts/ to usr/libexec/helper-scripts move usr/lib/curl-scripts to usr/libexec/helper-scripts as per lintian FHS
  • kicksecure-base-files
    • /etc/kicksecure_version: 16
  • kicksecure-meta-packages
    • add chromium to dummy-dependency so it can be removed
    • binaries-freedom → electrum
    • move obfs4proxy from kicksecure-dependencies-cli to kicksecure-recommended-cli https://forums.whonix.org/t/meta-packages-development-discussion/11948
    • kicksecure-cli Depends: kicksecure-recommended-cli
    • introduce kicksecure-recommended-cli install fasttrack-archive-keyring by default https://forums.whonix.org/t/install-debian-fasttrack-archive-keyring-by-default/11456
    • bullseye: libexo-1-0 → libexo-2-0
    • Merge branch ‘HulaHoop0-master-patch-35409’ into ‘master’ Added obfs4proxy and firefox-esr See merge request whonix/kicksecure-meta-packages!1
    • Added obfs4proxy and firefox-esr (Thanks to @HulaHoop!!)
  • onion-grater
    • upgrade to newer onion-grater version by Tails
  • open-link-confirmation
  • qubes-whonix
    • yum → dnf
    • Honor skip-torified-updates-proxy-check qvm-service Reintroduce the ability (from qubes-whonix < 15.4) to skip the torified-updates-proxy-check script by enabling a qvm-service. This allows a Whonix template to be updated through a non-Whonix qubes.UpdatesProxy VM if necessary. (Thanks to Rusty Bird!)
  • rads
    • do not start display manager if it was disabled (for example using sudo systemctl disable lightdm)
  • repository-dist
    • legacy
    • required change /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/derivative.gpg → /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/derivative.asc
    • use ascii armored gpg key; code simplification since APT folder /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d support ascii armored gpg keys since Debian bullseye
    • gnupg2 (dummy transitional package) → gnupg
  • sdwdate
    • deny /usr/sbin/ldconfig rix,
    • Conflicts: time-daemon
    • Replaces: time-daemon
    • Revert “bullseye” This reverts commit 67222afa9b01c8bba1f814d5c57b1c7632355d6d.
    • Provides: time-daemon to avoid systemd pulling Depends: systemd-timesyncd
    • config-test
  • security-misc
    • add hardened malloc compatibility for haveged workaround /lib/systemd/system/haveged.service.d/30_security-misc.conf SystemCallFilter=getrandom Otherwise haveged will exit with a core dump.
    • port from pam_tally2 to pam_faillock since pam_tally2 was deprecated upstream
    • port from pam_tally2 to pam_faillock since pam_tally2 was deprecated upstream
    • enable “apt-get --error-on=any” by default makes apt exit non-zero for transient failures /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/40error-on-any https://forums.whonix.org/t/debian-bullseye-apt-get-error-on-any/12068
    • replace no longer required /usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper with apt-get --error-on=any
    • port LKRG compatibility settings automation for VirtualBox hosts from systemd to dpkg trigger
    • improve LKRG VirtualBox host configuration as per https://github.com/openwall/lkrg/issues/82#issuecomment-886188999
    • add LKRG compatibility settings automation for VirtualBox hosts https://github.com/openwall/lkrg/issues/82
  • systemcheck
    • apparmor bullseye
    • @{PROC}/sys/kernel/osrelease r,
    • replace no longer required /usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper with apt-get --error-on=any
  • tb-starter
    • improve function tb_prefs_js_file_patches
    • Update path to local browser homepage. Patch prefs.js in user home folder. Because it changed during Whonix 15 to Whonix 16 upgrade. from /usr/share/homepage/whonix-welcome-page/whonix.html to /usr/share/doc/homepage/whonix-welcome-page/whonix.html
    • delete /usr/share/tb-profile-i2p/profile.i2p/bookmarks.html since unused
    • usr/share/homepage → usr/share/doc/homepage
  • tb-updater
    • alpha tbb_hardcoded_version=“11.0a4”
    • tbb_hardcoded_version=“10.5.5”
  • usability-misc
    • replace no longer required /usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper with apt-get --error-on=any
  • uwt
    • usr/lib/uwt_settings_show → usr/bin/uwt_settings_show
  • vm-config-dist
    • VirtualBox guest additions installer: switch to interest-await trigger Using interest-await instead of previously interest-noawait because when virtualbox-guest-additions-iso was upgraded as the same time as vm-config-dist the trigger was not executed.
    • Removed folder existence conditional to prevent catch-22 (Thanks to @HulaHoop!!)
  • whonix-base-files
    • /etc/whonix_version: 16
    • renamed: usr/lib/whonix/whonix.sh → usr/libexec/whonix-base-files/whonix.sh
  • whonix-developer-meta-files
    • renamed: migrate_to_buster_proposed_updates_repository → migrate_to_proposed_updates_repository renamed: migrate_to_buster_repository → migrate_to_stable_repository renamed: migrate_to_buster_testers_repository → migrate_to_testers_repository
    • modify warrant canary text as per: https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Dev/Warrant_Canary_Draft&oldid=65156 https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-warrant-canary/3208/29
  • whonix-firewall
    • TODO: /{,usr/}bin/qubesdb-cmd rUx,
    • owner /run/updatesproxycheck/** rw,
    • TODO: /{,usr/}bin/qubesdb-read rUx
    • After=systemd-modules-load.service required for LKRG otherwise iptables modules cannot be auto load
    • /var/log/journal/{,**} r,
  • whonix-initializer
    • change path
  • whonix-legacy
    • version
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • release-upgrade: fix, respect onion sources
    • workaround for Qubes specific perl: warning: Setting locale failed. issue https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4889
    • version
    • legacy
    • legacy
    • version
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • improve release-upgrade
    • forward port release-upgrade improvements
    • renamed: usr/libexec/release-upgrade → usr/sbin/release-upgrade
    • release-upgrade script: replace the apt functionality test package python-qt4 with nano siince python-qt4 installs too many packages, dependencies and nano is installed by default. Much faster test.
    • port release upgrade script to bullseye
  • whonix-welcome-page
    • usr/share/homepage → usr/share/doc/homepage
  • Whonix build script
    • remove virtualbox-guest-dkms since deprecated in Debian (integrated into kernel)
    • fasttrack
    • .gpg → .asc
    • Revert “build sources, Debian fasttrack: disable temporrily” This reverts commit 288323a86e2dc037b03e004c62ab3f8ce2b1f616.
    • avoid build dependency on ftpsync (for rsync test script)
    • VirtualBox builds: switch back to guest additions packages - virtualbox-guest-utils - virtualbox-guest-dkms - virtualbox-guest-x11 (Previously virtualbox-guest-additions-iso.)
    • VirtualBox builds: temporarily download package virtualbox from Debian sid until it becomes available from either Debian fasttrack or virtualbox.org https://forums.whonix.org/t/challenges-installing-virtualbox/9984/6
    • VirtualBox builds: accept both sources of VirtualBox packages - either package virtualbox (by Debian), or - package virtualbox-6.1 (by virtualbox.org)
    • build sources, Debian fasttrack: disable temporrily until https://salsa.debian.org/fasttrack-team/support/-/issues/24 is fixed
    • help-steps/repo_download_chroot_script: fix for Debian bullseye update order of parameters passed toAPT
    • disable download_virtualbox_packages_virtualbox_guest_additions_iso_from_debian_sid moving to Debian fasttrack version
    • disable download_virtualbox_packages_virtualbox_org moving to Debian fasttrack version
    • fasttrack
    • fasttrack
    • default whonix_build_auto_retry=“0” auto retry function error handler trap lacks variables such as variable APTGETOPT. Would miss out on security related APT configuration options: apt-get --error-on=any / -o APT::Update::Error-Mode=any
    • add backports and fasttrack to build sources by default to support downloading VirtualBox from Debian fasttrack
    • build dependencies for maintainers
    • remove python from cowbuilder image since no longer required since apt-get-update wrapper is no longer required
    • back to Tor version from packages.debian.org (instead of earlier deb.torproject.org) https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Tor https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-integration-in-whonix/10593
    • remove mmdebstrap copy from this source code no longer required version from Debian bullseye package is recent enough
    • remove python from cowbuilder image since no longer required since apt-get-update wrapper is no longer required
    • python3.9 no longer required in grml_packages since apt --error-on=any obsoleted any need for a python based apt-get wrapper
    • replace no longer required /usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper with apt-get --error-on=any
    • replace no longer required /usr/lib/security-misc/apt-get-wrapper with apt-get --error-on=any

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.1.9.3-developers-only...16.0.0.8-developers-only

(This testers wanted announcement might in future be transformed into a stable release announcement if no major issues are found during the testing period.)

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix 16.0.0.8 (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release - Testers Wanted!
